articles.description: Reaction to Tuesday night's FA Cup matches and build-up to more fifth-round ties on Wednesday.
articles.title: FA Cup reaction and latest football news

articles.description: Erling Haaland delivers an emphatic and ominous warning to Manchester City's rivals after scoring five goals in their 6-2 win at Luton in the FA Cup.
articles.title: 'We are coming' – 'machine' Haaland predicts 'exciting times'

articles.description: Newcastle beat Blackburn in a dramatic penalty shootout to edge into the FA Cup quarter-finals after a pulsating fifth-round tie at Ewood Park.
articles.title: Newcastle beat Blackburn in shootout thriller

articles.description: Max Strus scores from inside his own half to help the Cleveland Cavaliers to a thrilling comeback win over the Dallas Mavericks in the NBA.
articles.title: NBA: Cleveland Cavaliers 121-119 Dallas Mavericks - Max Strus scores 59ft buzzer-beater

articles.description: England have given "many answers to questions we had" in friendly victories over Austria and Italy this month, says manager Sarina Wiegman.
articles.title: England give ‘many answers to questions’ - Wiegman

articles.description: Spain's Jenni Hermoso says "football continues to give me life" six months on from winning the World Cup, when former Spanish federation chief Luis Rubiales kissed her.
articles.title: Football continues to give me life - Hermoso

articles.description: Bayern want Liverpool defender Andy Robertson to replace Alphonso Davies, Arsenal's search for a striker goes on, plus more.
articles.title: Bayern target Robertson - Wednesday's gossip

articles.description: The football pundit says black women are being targeted online, after she experienced a wave of abuse.
articles.title: Eni Aluko says X allows people to 'vomit hatred unchecked'

articles.description: A superb extra-time strike from Abdul Fatawu helps Championship leaders Leicester City progress past Bournemouth into the FA Cup quarter-finals.
articles.title: Fatawu stunner helps Leicester past Bournemouth

articles.description: Former Olympic heptathlete Dame Denise Lewis "temporarily" steps down as UK Athletics president two months after being elected.
articles.title: Dame Denise Lewis temporarily steps down as UK Athletics president
